ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: The event name for which the data was collected
At any time in your life, did anyone use force to take something away from you that you were carrying or wearing?
At any time in your life, did anyone steal something from you and never give it back?  Things like a backpack, money, watch, clothing, bike, cell phone, computer, or anything else?
At any time in your life, did anyone break or ruin any of your things on purpose?

Sometimes people are attacked with sticks, rocks, guns, knives, or other things that could hurt.  At any time in your life, did anyone hit or attack you on purpose with an object or weapon?  Somewhere like: at home, at school, at a store, in a car, on the street, or anywhere else?
At any time in your life, did anyone hit or attack you WITHOUT using a weapon?
At any time in your life, did someone start to  attack you, but for some reason it didn't happen?  For example, someone helped you, or you got away?
At any time in your life, did someone threaten to hurt you when you thought they might really do it?
When a person is kidnapped, it means they were made to go somewhere, like into a car, by someone who they thought might hurt them.  At any time in your life, has anyone ever tried to kidnap you?

At any time in your life, have you been hit or attacked because of your skin color, religion, or where your family comes from?  Or because of a physical problem you have?  Or because someone said you were gay?
Sometimes groups of kids or gangs attack people.  At any time in your life, did a group of kids or a gang hit, jump, or attack you?
At any time in your life, did any kid, even a brother or sister, hit you?  Somewhere like at home, at school, out playing, in a store, or anywhere else?
At any time in your life, did any kids try to hurt your private parts on purpose by hitting or kicking you there?
At any time in your life, did any kids, even a brother or sister, pick on you by chasing or grabbing you, or by making you do something you didn't want to do?
At any time in your life, did you get really scared or feel really bad because kids were calling you names, saying mean things to you, or saying they didn't want you around?
At any time in your life, did a boyfriend or girlfriend or anyone you went on a date with slap or hit you?
Notes: 1=Yes; 0=No; 98=I don't know; 99=I'd rather not say; 999=I have never dated (not applicable)

ElementDescription: At any time in your life, did any kids ever tell lies or spread rumors about you or try to make others dislike you?
At any time in your life, did any kids ever keep you out of things on purpose, exclude you from their group of friends, or completely ignore you?
At any time in your life, did you SEE a parent get pushed, slapped, hit, punched, or beat up by another parent, or their boyfriend or girlfriend?
At any time in your life, did you SEE a parent hit, beat, kick, or physically hurt your brothers or sisters, not including a spanking on the bottom?
Notes: 1=Yes; 0=No; 98=I don't know; 99=I'd rather not say; 999=I don't have any brothers or sisters

ElementDescription: At any time in your life, did you SEE anyone get attacked or hit on purpose WITH a stick, rock, gun, knife, or other thing that would hurt?  Somewhere like: at home, at school, at a store, in a car, on the street, or anywhere else?
At any time in your life, did you SEE anyone get attacked or hit on purpose WITHOUT using a stick, rock, gun, knife, or other thing that would hurt?
At any time in your life, did anyone steal something from your house that belongs to your family or someone you live with?  Things like a TV, stereo, car, or anything else?
At any time in your life, was anyone close to you murdered, like a friend, neighbor, or someone in your family?
At any time in your life, were you in any place in real life where you could see or hear people being shot, bombs going off, or street riots?
At any time in your life, were you in the middle of a war where you could hear real fighting with guns or bombs?
At any time in your life, did anyone hurt or threaten you with a real gun?
At any time in your life, did you see someone else get hurt or threatened with a real gun?
Have you ever gone to a school where someone said there was going to be a bomb or attack on the school and you thought they might really mean it?

Have you ever gone to a school where someone damaged the school or started a fire in the school on purpose?  Or did anyone break or ruin other school property like buses, windows, or sports equipment?
Has anyone ever used the <u>internet</u> to bother or harass you or to spread mean words or pictures about you?
Has anyone ever used a <u>cell phone or texting</u> to bother or harass you or to spread mean words or pictures about you?
How many times did this happen to you in your whole life? (If you aren't sure, a guess like 10 times or 50 times is better than nothing.)
How old were you the first time this happened?
Did this happen in the last 12 months?
How old were you when this last happened?
Were you physically hurt when this happened?  Hurt means you could still feel pain in your body the next day.  You are also hurt when you have a bruise, a cut that bleeds, or a broken bone.
Who did this? If there was more than one person, who was the most responsible?
Notes: 1=Brother, sister, or other child who lives with you (cousin, foster sibling, etc.); 2=Biological or adoptive father; 3=Step-father or live-in boyfriend; 4=Biological or adoptive mother; 5=Step-mother or live-in girlfriend; 6=Foster parent; 7=A relative who lives in your home (uncle, grandparent, etc.); 8=A relative who does not live with you; 9=A parent?s boyfriend, girlfriend, date, or ex-boyfriend or girlfriend who does not live with you; 10=Grown-up you know from some organization, such as a teacher, coach, or youth group leader; 11=Anyone else you know such as a friend or neighbor or schoolmate; 12=Stranger (a stranger is someone you don't know); 13=Boyfriend/girlfriend, or ex-boyfriend/ex-girlfriend; 14=Other; 98=I don't know; 99=I'd rather not say

Was this person a man, woman, boy, or girl?
Did the person who did this use any of these?  : Gun

Did the person who did this use any of these?  :  I'd rather not say
